title: How to run a jupyter notebook through a remote server on local machine?
text:
First, it’s important to create a virtual environment where you’ll run your Jupyter notebook. This isolates your project dependencies from other Python projects.
python3 -m venv path/to/venv

title: How to run a jupyter notebook through a remote server on local machine?
text:
First, it’s important to create a virtual environment where you’ll run your Jupyter notebook. This isolates your project dependencies from other Python projects.
python3 -m venv path/to/venv

title: How to run a jupyter notebook through a remote server on local machine?
text:
Creating a virtual environment
First, it is important to create a virtual enviroment where you will run your jupyter notebook.
python3 -m venv path/to/venv
To activate it, type the following into your command line:
source path/to/venv/bin/activate
Install jupyter lab or jupyter notebook in your new environement:
pip install jupyterlab  # for Jupyter Lab
